SEARCH
Package gw.api.locale

Class NumberFormatUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.locale.NumberFormatUtil
public class NumberFormatUtil extends Object
Contains simple static helper methods for rendering and parsing Numbers.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static String
    convertLocalizedToEnglish(String decimalValue)
    Converts from the localized version of the number to standard English locale.
    static IGWNumberFormat
    getNumberFormat()
     
    static BigDecimal
    parse(String valueAsString)
    Parses a String into a Number formatted as a number in the current locale.
    static int
    parseInt(String valueAsString)
    Parses string to int.
    static long
    parseLong(String valueAsString)
    Parses string to long.
    static String
    render(Number value)
    Converts a Number into a String formatted as a number in the current locale.
    static String
    renderForInput(Number value, boolean exact)
    Like render, but does not render thousands separators, making it more suitable for input fields.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • render

      public static String render(Number value)
      Converts a Number into a String formatted as a number in the current locale. A null input is interpreted as an empty string.

    • renderForInput

      public static String renderForInput(Number value, boolean exact)
      Like render, but does not render thousands separators, making it more suitable for input fields.

    • parse

      public static BigDecimal parse(String valueAsString) throws NumberFormatException
      Parses a String into a Number formatted as a number in the current locale. An empty or null String is interpreted as null.
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException

    • parseInt

      public static int parseInt(String valueAsString) throws NumberFormatException
      Parses string to int. This method strips out thousand's symbol if any
      Parameters:
      valueAsString - string
      Returns:
      int
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - see Integer.parseInt(String) for more info

    • parseLong

      public static long parseLong(String valueAsString) throws NumberFormatException
      Parses string to long. This method strips out thousand's symbol if any
      Parameters:
      valueAsString - string
      Returns:
      long
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - see Long.parseLong(String) for more info

    • convertLocalizedToEnglish

      public static String convertLocalizedToEnglish(String decimalValue)
      Converts from the localized version of the number to standard English locale. Useful for massaging values before passing to field validators.

    • getNumberFormat

      public static IGWNumberFormat getNumberFormat()
